analyzed: chos thams cad zag pa med pa'i bdug pas gcig tu slon pa phyir ro //
translated: because she is perfumed with the incense of the undefiled Dharma.

original: gnyis zhes bya ba ni mar me ma ste /
analyzed: gnyis zhes bya ba ni mar me ma ste /
translated: The one called ‚Äútwo‚Äù is the lamp,

original: snying rje'i snum las byung ba'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi sgron mes gnyis kyi rab rib bzlog nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan snang bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying rje'i snum las byung ba'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi sgron mes gnyis kyi rab rib bzlog nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan snang bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the lamp of nondual intuition, which arises from the oil of compassion, dispels the darkness of duality and illuminates the qualities of buddhahood.

original: mkha' bde zhes bya ba ni byug pa ma ste /üîΩnam mkha' ma lus par rgyas pa'i bla na med pa'i dbyings @56a * //
analyzed: mkha' bde zhes bya ba ni byug pa ma ste / nam mkha' ma lus par rgyas pa'i bla na med pa'i dbyings @56a * //
translated: The one called ‚Äúspace bliss‚Äù is the ointment,

original: kyi dri la dga' zhing grags pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrtag pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //üîΩdrug dang lnga dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kyi dri la dga' zhing grags pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro // rtag pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so // drug dang lnga dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: because she delights in the fragrance of the unexcelled realm that pervades the entire realm of space, and because she is the nature of fame.

original: rdo rje nyi ma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma ste /
translated: The ones called ‚Äúsix‚Äù and ‚Äúfive‚Äù are the vajra sun,

original: nga rgyal la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa drug dang / sgrib pa lnga'i gnyen po mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nga rgyal la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa drug dang / sgrib pa lnga'i gnyen po mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is the nature of equanimity, the antidote to the six afflictions such as pride and the five obscurations.

original: drug gnyis zhes bya ba ni lag na nyi ma ma ste /
analyzed: drug gnyis zhes bya ba ni lag na nyi ma ma ste /
translated: The one called ‚Äúsix two‚Äù is the sun-handed,üîΩbecause she is the nature of the six perfections such as generosity, which are the antidotes to the six afflictions such as stinginess.

original: nyi ma bcu gnyis bsdus pa'i snang bas ma rig pa'i mun nag bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyi ma bcu gnyis bsdus pa'i snang bas ma rig pa'i mun nag bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The twelve suns are the light that overcomes the darkness of ignorance.

original: bzhi zhes bya ba ni mar me ste rnal 'byor bzhi'i ye shes kyi snang bas rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib sel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzhi zhes bya ba ni mar me ste rnal 'byor bzhi'i ye shes kyi snang bas rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib sel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The four are the lamp, because the light of the wisdom of the four yogas removes the darkness of conceptualization.

original: 'gro ba rnams zhes bya ba ni rin chen sgron ma ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams zhes bya ba ni rin chen sgron ma ste /
translated: The beings are the jewel lamp,

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi mun pa'i dra ba 'joms par byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩnyi shur gcig gis ma tshang ba //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi mun pa'i dra ba 'joms par byed pa'i phyir ro // nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang ba //
translated: because it destroys the net of darkness of beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni lag na glog 'dzin ma ste /üîΩkhams bco brgyad dang gang zag tu 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag na glog 'dzin ma ste / khams bco brgyad dang gang zag tu 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The nineteen are the lightning-bearer,

original: rnam par rtog pa bcu dgu'i chu bo gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi snang bas sel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bcu dgu'i chu bo gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi snang bas sel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the light of nondual wisdom removes the river of the nineteen conceptualizations that grasp the eighteen elements and the person.

original: khams gsum po ni ma lus dang // zhes bya ba ni sgeg mo ste /
analyzed: khams gsum po ni ma lus dang // zhes bya ba ni sgeg mo ste /
translated: The three realms are the dancer,

original: khams gsum ma lus pa thams cad la pha rol par ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus pa thams cad la pha rol par ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it shows the other side of the entire three realms.

original: pha zhes bya ba ni phreng ba ma ste /
analyzed: pha zhes bya ba ni phreng ba ma ste /
translated: The father is the garland-bearer,

original: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bcing ba las sgrol ba'i phyir dang / don dam pa'i rin po che la rol cing 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bcing ba las sgrol ba'i phyir dang / don dam pa'i rin po che la rol cing 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he liberates from the bondage of the afflictions, etc. , and because he enjoys and holds the ultimate jewel.

original: bu ga zhes bya ba ni glu mkhan ma ste /
analyzed: bu ga zhes bya ba ni glu mkhan ma ste /
translated: The hole is the singer,

original: thar pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par mdzad cing /
analyzed: thar pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par mdzad cing /
translated: because he causes entry into the city of liberation,

original: bla na med pa'i chos ston pa'i dbyangs kyis skyob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i chos ston pa'i dbyangs kyis skyob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because he protects with the melody of the teaching of the unsurpassed Dharma.

original: ma zhes bya ba ni gar mkhan ma ste /
analyzed: ma zhes bya ba ni gar mkhan ma ste /
translated: The mother is the dancer,

original: gar gyi phyag rgya skyong bas bdud kyi rgya mtsho las grol ba'i phyir ro ;üîΩ/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
analyzed: gar gyi phyag rgya skyong bas bdud kyi rgya mtsho las grol ba'i phyir ro ; / rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
translated: because she liberates from the ocean of demons by means of the dance mudra.

original: phyi rol don zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das padma gar gyi dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: phyi rol don zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das padma gar gyi dbang phyug ste /
translated: The external object is the Lord of the Lotus Dance,

original: gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pas bcings shing mnan nas don rnams la gzigs pa'i so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pas bcings shing mnan nas don rnams la gzigs pa'i so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is the nature of the discriminating wisdom which sees objects, having crushed and bound the conceptualizations of the apprehended, etc.

original: nang dang zhes bya ba ni lag na padma ste /
analyzed: nang dang zhes bya ba ni lag na padma ste /
translated: The inner is Padmahasta,

original: snying rje chen po'i 'dod chags chen pos nang zhes bya ba padma'i bdag nyid ston pa'i phyir ro //üîΩbtsun mo kun gyi chos dang ni //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'dod chags chen pos nang zhes bya ba padma'i bdag nyid ston pa'i phyir ro // btsun mo kun gyi chos dang ni //
translated: because he shows the nature of the lotus, with great passion of great compassion.

original: zhes bya ba ni lag na chos 'byung ma ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag na chos 'byung ma ste /
translated: The dharma of all queens is Dharmameghahasta,

original: bde ba chen po spel bar bya ba'i phyir chos 'byung ba bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po spel bar bya ba'i phyir chos 'byung ba bsnams pa'o //
translated: because she holds the source of dharma in order to increase great bliss.

original: las @56b rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni lag na lcags sgrog ma ste /
analyzed: las @56b rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni lag na lcags sgrog ma ste /
translated: The all actions is Shakulopani,

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad byams pas 'ching ba'i las byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad byams pas 'ching ba'i las byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because she performs the action of binding all buddhas and bodhisattvas with love.

original: bdag med ma zhes bya ba ni kun du 'khyud ma ste /
analyzed: bdag med ma zhes bya ba ni kun du 'khyud ma ste /
translated: The selfless is Anangamali,

original: bde ba chen po chos thams cad bdag med par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams rjes su chags pas 'ching ba'i phyir bdag la kun du 'khyud par ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba chen po chos thams cad bdag med par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams rjes su chags pas 'ching ba'i phyir bdag la kun du 'khyud par ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because she shows the embrace of the self, teaching the selflessness of all phenomena with great bliss, and because she binds the buddhas with passion.

original: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni gling bu ma ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni gling bu ma ste /
translated: The fruit is Vinasikha,üîΩbecause she is the fruit of the tree of the Dharma.

original: bu ga dang ldan pa'i gling bu 'bud pa'i phyag rgyas chos rnams stong pa nyid du dral te /üîΩston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bu ga dang ldan pa'i gling bu 'bud pa'i phyag rgyas chos rnams stong pa nyid du dral te / ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The gesture of playing a flute with a hole in it is used to show that all phenomena are empty.

original: rgyu zhes bya ba ni pi wang ma ste /
analyzed: rgyu zhes bya ba ni pi wang ma ste /
translated: The cause is the vƒ´·πáƒÅ,

original: skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa'i sgras 'dod chags la sogs pa bsal zhing dor bar bya ba nyid du ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa'i sgras 'dod chags la sogs pa bsal zhing dor bar bya ba nyid du ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the words ‚Äúarising,‚Äù ‚Äúceasing,‚Äù and so on are used to show that desire and so on are to be abandoned.

original: bya bar grags zhes bya ba ni rdza rnga ma ste /
analyzed: bya bar grags zhes bya ba ni rdza rnga ma ste /
translated: The action is the m·πõda·πÖga,

original: rdza rnga'i kha cig la brdung ba'i tshul gyis bdag med pa'i byang chub tu bya ba ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdza rnga'i kha cig la brdung ba'i tshul gyis bdag med pa'i byang chub tu bya ba ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the way of beating a certain m·πõda·πÖga is used to show the action of enlightenment without a self.

original: bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdo rje can //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdo rje can //
translated: The vajra is the means of accomplishing the object of practice,üîΩbecause, having placed it on the throat, the way of beating it with two hands is used to show the three bodies with their cause.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnga chen ma ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnga chen ma ste /
translated: The great drum is the means of accomplishing the object of practice,

original: mgrin par btags nas lag pa gnyis brdung ba'i tshul gyis rgyu dang bcas pa'i sku gsum ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mgrin par btags nas lag pa gnyis brdung ba'i tshul gyis rgyu dang bcas pa'i sku gsum ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because, having placed it on the throat, the way of beating it with two hands is used to show the three bodies with their cause.

original: padma gar gyi dbang phyug pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
analyzed: padma gar gyi dbang phyug pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala of the lord of the dance of the lotus is the means of accomplishing the object of practice.

original: 'di ltar kun gzhi rnam shes 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar kun gzhi rnam shes 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, the foundation consciousness is transformed.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyi phung po'i rang bzhin rta mchog ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyi phung po'i rang bzhin rta mchog ste /
translated: The Blessed One is the nature of the aggregate of compositional factors, the supreme horse.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ltar bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyis sku sna tshogs sprul zhing rnam par rtog pa bcom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ltar bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyis sku sna tshogs sprul zhing rnam par rtog pa bcom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Like the all-base consciousness, the wisdom of purposeful activity emanates various bodies and conquers discursive thought.

original: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sgo lcags ma ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sgo lcags ma ste /
translated: The ‚Äúrealm of phenomena‚Äù is the vajra door bolt.

original: zag pa med pa'i dbyings kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes srung bar byed pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i dbyings kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes srung bar byed pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because the uncontaminated realm protects the wisdom of omniscience.

original: / ma byung dang zhes bya ba ni lde kyog 'dzin ma ste /
analyzed: / ma byung dang zhes bya ba ni lde kyog 'dzin ma ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNon-arisen‚Äù is the vajra key ring.

original: ye shes bzung nas de'i sgo bcad pas nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa 'jug par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes bzung nas de'i sgo bcad pas nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa 'jug par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, having grasped the wisdom, the door is closed and discursive thoughts such as afflictions are not allowed to enter.

original: sems can khams zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sgo glegs ma ste /
analyzed: sems can khams zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sgo glegs ma ste /
translated: The ‚Äúrealm of sentient beings‚Äù is the vajra door panel.

original: sems can gyi khams ltar ye shes skyes pa mi 'dor ba dang nyes pa rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ltar ye shes skyes pa mi 'dor ba dang nyes pa rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, like the realm of sentient beings, the arisen wisdom is not discarded and faults are not allowed to enter, it is without beginning or end.

original: nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba ni rdo rje yol ba ma ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba ni rdo rje yol ba ma ste /
translated: The one called the space element is Vajra-Pata,

original: rang gi 'od kyi btsun mo rab tu bsrung ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa'i yol ba 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi 'od kyi btsun mo rab tu bsrung ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa'i yol ba 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because she holds a curtain that pervades the realm of space in order to protect the queen of one's own light.

original: bdag med ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas @57a * //üîΩspyan ma ste /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas @57a * // spyan ma ste /
translated: The one called the selflessness is Buddhalocana,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad sems can gyi bdag nyid kyis me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad sems can gyi bdag nyid kyis me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all buddhas are the nature of sentient beings, and are the phenomena of mirror-like intuition.

original: bdag nyid tha snyad ces bya ba ni m'a ma k'i ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid tha snyad ces bya ba ni m'a ma k'i ste /
translated: The one called the convention of self is Mamaki,

original: gnyis po rnam par spyod na /
analyzed: gnyis po rnam par spyod na /
translated: because when the two are analyzed,

original: gnyis med pa ni tha snyad yin la /üîΩde 'di la yod pas na bdag gi tha snyad can te /
analyzed: gnyis med pa ni tha snyad yin la / de 'di la yod pas na bdag gi tha snyad can te /
translated: nonduality is the convention.

original: de gnyis pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: She has the convention of self because she is the phenomenon of that duality.

original: dngos dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo ste /
analyzed: dngos dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo ste /
translated: The one called the absence of things is Pandaravasini,

original: gnyis kyi dngos po rnams stong pa nyid kyi rnam par dpyad nas rtog pa dang bral ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis kyi dngos po rnams stong pa nyid kyi rnam par dpyad nas rtog pa dang bral ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because she is the reality free from conceptual thought, having analyzed the things of the two as emptiness.

original: dngos med pa zhes bya ba ni sgrol ma ste /
analyzed: dngos med pa zhes bya ba ni sgrol ma ste /
translated: The one called non-entity is Tara,

original: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa rnams su chos ston pa 'gro zhing sgrib pa'i dngos po dang bral ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa rnams su chos ston pa 'gro zhing sgrib pa'i dngos po dang bral ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because she is the reality free from the entity of obscuration, going to all the worldly realms to teach the Dharma by means of the various emanations of the Buddha.üîΩThe one called supreme horse is Hayagriva,

original: rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
analyzed: rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
translated: because he is the mandala of the supreme horse.

original: bde ba can zhes bya ba ni goo r'i ste /
analyzed: bde ba can zhes bya ba ni goo r'i ste /

original: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yin la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yin la /
translated: because she is the mandala of wisdom, the nature of great bliss.

original: de dad pas srung zhing 'gugs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dad pas srung zhing 'gugs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: She is the one who protects and attracts that [bliss] with faith.

original: gru gsum la zhes bya ba ni tsoo r'i ste /
analyzed: gru gsum la zhes bya ba ni tsoo r'i ste /
translated: The one called triangular is CaurI,

original: de la kha cig na re khams gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i gzugs ston par byed pa zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de la kha cig na re khams gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i gzugs ston par byed pa zhes zer ro //
translated: because she displays the form that overwhelms the three realms.

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gru ni gnyis su nges pa yin la /
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gru ni gnyis su nges pa yin la /
translated: The mandala of wisdom is ascertained as two triangles.

original: gru gcig tu nges pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gru gcig tu nges pa yin na ni /
translated: If it were ascertained as one triangle,

original: de la goms par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la goms par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it would be grasped as familiar.

original: yang na brtson 'grus kyi lus la sogs pa la sku la sogs pa 'dzud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na brtson 'grus kyi lus la sogs pa la sku la sogs pa 'dzud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, the body of vigor is inserted into the body, etc.

original: rdul med ces bya ba ni dran pa'i rang bzhin ni ro langs ma ste /
analyzed: rdul med ces bya ba ni dran pa'i rang bzhin ni ro langs ma ste /
translated: The one called ‚Äúwithout dust‚Äù is VetƒÅlƒ´, whose nature is mindfulness.

original: rdul ni dam tshig dang ye shes kyi rtog pa yin la /
analyzed: rdul ni dam tshig dang ye shes kyi rtog pa yin la /
translated: Dust is the concept of commitment and intuition;

original: gnyis po stong pa nyid kyi drangs lcags sgrog gis gcig tu byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis po stong pa nyid kyi drangs lcags sgrog gis gcig tu byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: she is ‚Äúwithout dust‚Äù because she makes them one with the emptiness of the two.

original: skyon bral zhes bya ba ni ghasma r'i ste /
analyzed: skyon bral zhes bya ba ni ghasma r'i ste /
translated: The one called ‚Äúfree of faults‚Äù is Ghasmarƒ´,

original: rdo rje dril bu'i sgras 'bebs par byed cing ting nge 'dzin gyis rang bzhin gyis rnam par g-yeng ba'i skyon thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu'i sgras 'bebs par byed cing ting nge 'dzin gyis rang bzhin gyis rnam par g-yeng ba'i skyon thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: who is ‚Äúfree of faults‚Äù because she eliminates all faults of distraction by nature with meditative concentration, and because she brings down with the sound of the vajra and bell.

original: rdul bral zhes bya ba ni pukka s'i ste /
analyzed: rdul bral zhes bya ba ni pukka s'i ste /
translated: The one called ‚Äúwithout stain‚Äù is Pukkasƒ´,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / snying rjes ser sna dang / sdang ba'i nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / snying rjes ser sna dang / sdang ba'i nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir te /
translated: who is ‚Äúwithout stain‚Äù because she eliminates the faults of stinginess and hatred with the perfection of generosity and compassion.

original: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba dang / sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba dang / sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: She is the first stage, the Joyous, and the nature of the earth element.

original: sdig bcom zhes bya ba ni sa ba r'i ste /
analyzed: sdig bcom zhes bya ba ni sa ba r'i ste /
translated: The one called ‚ÄúDestroyer of Evil‚Äù is Savarƒ´,

original: tshul khrims dang byams pas tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / mi brtse ba'i sdig pa bcom pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang byams pas tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / mi brtse ba'i sdig pa bcom pa'i phyir te /
translated: because she destroys the evil of immorality and lack of compassion through morality and love.

original: @57b sa dri ma med pa dang / chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: @57b sa dri ma med pa dang / chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: She is the Stainless earth and the nature of the water element.

original: khro gnyer med pa zhes bya ba ni tsanda l'i ste /
analyzed: khro gnyer med pa zhes bya ba ni tsanda l'i ste /

analyzed: nang gi bde ba mchog rig pa //

analyzed: mchog ni mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba ste /

analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //

original: phan pa zhes bya ba ni lhun gyis grub par 'jug pas so //
analyzed: phan pa zhes bya ba ni lhun gyis grub par 'jug pas so //
translated: Benefit means that it is engaged spontaneously.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: Yoga is by the nature of wisdom and means.

original: ci ste gzung ba dang 'dzin pas snang bas 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin 'ba' zhig yin no snyam du dogs pa la /
analyzed: ci ste gzung ba dang 'dzin pas snang bas 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin 'ba' zhig yin no snyam du dogs pa la /
translated: If one doubts that it is only the nature of error because of the appearance of object and subject,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'jug / ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'jug / ces bya ba smos te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúEntering the nature of all buddhas.‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gnyis kyis stong pa nyid kyis gang dang gang nyams su myong ba de dang de /üîΩbrdzun pa nyid du yongs su spyod pas 'khrul pa med pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gnyis kyis stong pa nyid kyis gang dang gang nyams su myong ba de dang de / brdzun pa nyid du yongs su spyod pas 'khrul pa med pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The nature of all buddhas is the emptiness of the two pristine consciousnesses.

original: dngos po gang dang gang gis ni //
analyzed: dngos po gang dang gang gis ni //
translated: That which is experienced by that is only nonerroneous because of being thoroughly enjoyed as false.üîΩBy whatever things

original: zhes bya ba ni rigs gang dang gang gis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rigs gang dang gang gis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means by whatever type.

original: sems can rnams kyi rigs 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog gi rigs lnga'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi rigs 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog gi rigs lnga'i bye brag gis so //
translated: The types of sentient beings are the five types of desire, anger, ignorance, pride, and jealousy.

original: des na de yi rang bzhin 'gro //
analyzed: des na de yi rang bzhin 'gro //
translated: Therefore, the nature of those is the migrating beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni des byang chub kyi rigs lngar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni des byang chub kyi rigs lngar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is the fivefold enlightenment family of that .

original: sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu zhes bya ba ni nor bu shel sgong ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu zhes bya ba ni nor bu shel sgong ste /
translated: The gem is variegated,

original: mdza' ba'i me tog la sogs pa'i kha dog nye bar bsgyur du rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdza' ba'i me tog la sogs pa'i kha dog nye bar bsgyur du rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is suitable to be transformed into the color of the flowers of the beloved, etc.üîΩBorn from the vajra of the mind,

original: thugs kyi rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is born from the gnosis which is like a vajra.üîΩOne‚Äôs own conceptualization is the view of self-grasping, etc.,

original: rang gi rnam rtog ces bya ba ni bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i lta ba ste gnyis brtags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi rnam rtog ces bya ba ni bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i lta ba ste gnyis brtags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is imagined as a duality.

original: rnam dag ces bya ba ni glo bur gyi dri ma rnams dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rnam dag ces bya ba ni glo bur gyi dri ma rnams dang bral ba'o //
translated: Pure means free from the stains of adventitious defilements.

original: sems dag pa ni bde ba yin //
analyzed: sems dag pa ni bde ba yin //
translated: A pure mind is bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is because

original: @59b dri ma gsum spangs pa las zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @59b dri ma gsum spangs pa las zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the great untainted bliss arises from the abandonment of the three stains.

original: ci ste mdog dang mtshan ma la sogs pa'i spros pas grol ba'i thabs su ji ltar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas /
analyzed: ci ste mdog dang mtshan ma la sogs pa'i spros pas grol ba'i thabs su ji ltar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas /
translated: If one thinks that the elaboration of color, signs, etc. is the means of liberation,üîΩthen .

original: gal te stong pa thabs yin na //
analyzed: gal te stong pa thabs yin na //
translated: If emptiness were the method,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on.

original: gal te thabs dang bral ba'i stong pa 'ba' zhig lam du 'dod na de'i tshe bskal pa bye bas kyang sangs rgyas nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te thabs dang bral ba'i stong pa 'ba' zhig lam du 'dod na de'i tshe bskal pa bye bas kyang sangs rgyas nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: If one asserts that mere emptiness devoid of method is the path, then even in ten million eons one will not become a buddha,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa zhi ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyis mi khom pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa zhi ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyis mi khom pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: because one will attain an unfavorable state due to the peaceful result of the sphere of infinite space and so on.

original: 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i lugs las kyang 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i lugs las kyang 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not asserted even in the system of the perfections.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i thabs dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i thabs dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: It is said that one should cultivate the perfection of wisdom endowed with the method of the five perfections.

original: thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab 'ba' zhig gis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab 'ba' zhig gis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

original: ci ste stong pa de nyid lam gyi gnas skabs na ni thabs yin la /
analyzed: ci ste stong pa de nyid lam gyi gnas skabs na ni thabs yin la /
translated: If one thinks that emptiness itself is the method when it is the occasion of the path,

original: smin pa'i gnas skabs na ni 'bras bu yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: smin pa'i gnas skabs na ni 'bras bu yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: and it is the result when it is the occasion of fruition,

original: rgyu la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rgyu la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is stated:

original: de'i tshe lam dang smin pa gnyis kyi stong pa nyid la bye brag med pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'dod pa bzhin du stong pa nyid thabs ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i tshe lam dang smin pa gnyis kyi stong pa nyid la bye brag med pa'i phyir 'bras bu 'dod pa bzhin du stong pa nyid thabs ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time, since there is no difference between the emptiness of the path and the emptiness of the effect, emptiness would not be the method, as desired.‚Äù

original: rgyu ni spros pa'i ngo bo nyid de dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu ni spros pa'i ngo bo nyid de dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cause is the nature of conceptual elaboration because it has an object.

original: 'bras bu ni spros pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid de dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni spros pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid de dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //

original: de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu tha dad par grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu tha dad par grub po //

original: de'i phyir thabs ni stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig ma yin par grub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir thabs ni stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig ma yin par grub pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is established that the method is not just emptiness alone.

original: 'o na ci'i phyir stong pa nyid gsungs snyam du sems na /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir stong pa nyid gsungs snyam du sems na /

original: phyin ci log bzlog pas thabs kyi yan lag nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyin ci log bzlog pas thabs kyi yan lag nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /

analyzed: lta ba las ni log pa rnams //

original: zhes bya ba chos la bdag med pa la sogs pa lta ba log cing mi mthun pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba chos la bdag med pa la sogs pa lta ba log cing mi mthun pa'o //

original: bdag tu lta ba tshol ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni bdag tu lta ba tshol ba ste /
analyzed: bdag tu lta ba tshol ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni bdag tu lta ba tshol ba ste /

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa ste /
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa ste /
translated: They are those who are attached to the apprehension of self.

original: de rnams kyi bdag tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba bzlog pa'i phyir stong pa nyid rgyal bas gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩci ste pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs kyis zin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du spyod cing @60a * //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bdag tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba bzlog pa'i phyir stong pa nyid rgyal bas gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to // ci ste pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs kyis zin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du spyod cing @60a * //
translated: For the sake of reversing the view of the apprehension of self of those, the Victor taught emptiness.

original: mgo sbyin par btang ba la sogs pa dkar ba'i spyod pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub 'grub par bstan pa yin na dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la sogs pa'i thabs kyis ci bya zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes /

translated: If it is taught that enlightenment is accomplished by the perfection vehicle through practicing the five perfections for three incalculable aeons, and by giving one‚Äôs head and limbs, and so on, through various white deeds, and if it is taught that the perfection vehicle is embraced by the method of the perfection of wisdom, what is the use of the method of the ma·πá·∏çalacakra and so on?

original: thabs ni bde ba'i sdom pa ste //
analyzed: thabs ni bde ba'i sdom pa ste //
translated: Therefore, the method is the vow of bliss.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: And so on is said.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'khor dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga de dag nyid lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor bsdus pa thabs yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'khor dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga de dag nyid lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor bsdus pa thabs yin te /
translated: Therefore, those very five perfections together with their retinue are the method, included in the circle of the divine mandala.

original: bde ba'i thabs zhes bya ba ni dka' ba'i spyod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i thabs zhes bya ba ni dka' ba'i spyod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The method of bliss is not the practice of difficulty.

original: sdom pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sdom pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The vow is

original: bde ba nyid du bstan pa te /
analyzed: bde ba nyid du bstan pa te /

original: ci ste sangs rgyas kyi sku chos kyi sku rnams med pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya ba'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste sangs rgyas kyi sku chos kyi sku rnams med pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya ba'am zhe na /
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúShould the bodies of the Buddhas be cultivated in the manner of non-existence?‚Äù

original: sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: thabs ni sku gsum gyi gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rang bzhin gyis gnas par bstan to //

analyzed: brjod pa ni au'o //

translated: The syllable ‚Äúom‚Äù is the emptiness of the object and the mind,

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi me 'bar bas snang ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: a'a zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o //

original: gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: The one called Lord of Dance and so forth.

original: gar ni rnam par rol pa'o //
analyzed: gar ni rnam par rol pa'o //
translated: Dance is play.

original: dbang phyug ni de'i gtso bo ste /
analyzed: dbang phyug ni de'i gtso bo ste /
translated: Lord is the chief of that.

original: chos thams cad la so sor rtog cing rnam par sna tshogs kyi gdul bya rnams la longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la so sor rtog cing rnam par sna tshogs kyi gdul bya rnams la longs spyod pa'o //
translated: It is the discernment of all phenomena and the enjoyment of various disciples.

original: tr'am zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de kho na nyid nyams su myong bas chags @62a * //
analyzed: tr'am zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de kho na nyid nyams su myong bas chags @62a * //
translated: Tar means attached by experiencing the reality of all buddhas.

original: shing mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: shing mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: It is equality.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang kho na nyid ni yi ge ta'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang kho na nyid ni yi ge ta'o //
translated: All buddhas are reality, which is the syllable ta.

original: nyams su myong bas chags pa'i mnyam pa ni ra'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong bas chags pa'i mnyam pa ni ra'o //
translated: Attachment by experience is equality, which is ra.

original: yid ni ma'o //
analyzed: yid ni ma'o //
translated: Mind is ma.

original: gdugs gcig ces bya ba ni mnyam par 'gegs pa'o //
analyzed: gdugs gcig ces bya ba ni mnyam par 'gegs pa'o //
translated: One parasol means equal obstruction.

original: tsha ba sel ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'o //
analyzed: tsha ba sel ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'o //
translated: Removing heat means removing the torment of afflictions.

original: 'khor lo'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni nyi ma lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni nyi ma lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: Wheel-like means the wisdom like the sun.

original: kham zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i yid de kham /
analyzed: kham zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i yid de kham /
translated: Kha means the emanation mind equal to space, which is kha.

original: rdo rje mgyogs 'gro zhes bya ba ni chos kyis mgyogs par 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje mgyogs 'gro zhes bya ba ni chos kyis mgyogs par 'gro ba ste /
translated: Vajra-swift is the swiftness of the Dharma.

original: de dang der sprul pa sna tshogs ston pa'o //
analyzed: de dang der sprul pa sna tshogs ston pa'o //
translated: It is the manifestation of various emanations here and there.

original: snying rje'i chang zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi rtog pa bzhus nas ro gcig mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: snying rje'i chang zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi rtog pa bzhus nas ro gcig mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Compassion-wine is the melting of the concepts of duality, the nature of the single taste of equality.

original: m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyis sgyu ma 'joms pa'i las te m'a ma k'i ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyis sgyu ma 'joms pa'i las te m'a ma k'i ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Mamaki is the action of destroying the magic of duality. Mamaki is Akshobhya.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni gzung la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa zhi ba'i phyir sems tsam nyid do //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni gzung la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa zhi ba'i phyir sems tsam nyid do //
translated: Peace is the mere mind, because of the pacification of the concepts of subject and so forth.

original: chags pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyis stong pa'i ye shes nyams su myong bar yongs su gcod par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyis stong pa'i ye shes nyams su myong bar yongs su gcod par gnas pa'o //
translated: Passion is the determination to experience the wisdom of the emptiness of duality.

original: dbang mo che zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs su sprul pa rnams kyi rjes su 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dbang mo che zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs su sprul pa rnams kyi rjes su 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Mahabala is the nature of supporting the emanations in the various worlds.

original: mig yon zhes bya ba ni steng dang 'og tu blta ba ste /
analyzed: mig yon zhes bya ba ni steng dang 'og tu blta ba ste /
translated: Eye-gem is the looking upward and downward.

original: 'khor ba dang zhi blta ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang zhi blta ba'o //
translated: It is the looking at samsara and nirvana.

original: de la phyogs gcig tu bstan pa ni khang pa sum brtsegs byas nas khang pa 'og mar ni gar byed pa'i gar mkhan rnams gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de la phyogs gcig tu bstan pa ni khang pa sum brtsegs byas nas khang pa 'og mar ni gar byed pa'i gar mkhan rnams gzhag pa'o //
translated: The teaching in one direction is that one should make a three-storied house and place the dancing girls who are dancers in the lower house.

original: bar mar ni bza' bca' la sogs pa'i yo byad gzhag go //üîΩsteng mar ni dkyil 'khor lo'i khar bzhag la dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs las /
analyzed: bar mar ni bza' bca' la sogs pa'i yo byad gzhag go // steng mar ni dkyil 'khor lo'i khar bzhag la dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs las /
translated: In the middle one should place the articles such as food and drink.

original: go rims smos pa bzhin ting nge 'dzin gsum bya ste /
analyzed: go rims smos pa bzhin ting nge 'dzin gsum bya ste /
translated: In the upper one, having placed the mandala, one should perform the three meditative stabilizations in the order mentioned in the Mandala Ritual of the Compendium of Principles.

original: slob ma bzhi dang rnal 'byor ma bzhi dang bcas pas rang rang gi 'khor los sgyur bar bcos par bya zhing /
analyzed: slob ma bzhi dang rnal 'byor ma bzhi dang bcas pas rang rang gi 'khor los sgyur bar bcos par bya zhing /

translated: Similarly, in the southwest corner is PƒÅ·πá·∏çaravƒÅsinƒ´, red in color, holding a contrived lotus, who with a passionate gaze acts to attract people.

translated: Similarly, in the northwest corner is TƒÅrƒÅ, green in color, holding an utpala flower, who with a blazing gaze attracts those to be tamed.

analyzed: bcos ma'i sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la g-yon brkyang bas gnas shing /

translated: It is the vase of total victory.

original: yang na snyoms par 'jug pa'i mchod pa las byung ba'i bum pa brgyad po yang dag par bya'o ;

analyzed: mnyes par bya zhes bya ba ni bkru bar bya ba'o //

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /

analyzed: snang ba mo la sogs @67b pa'i lha mo rnams kyir nam par dag pa yin la /

analyzed: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi padma gar dbang gi rang bzhin bas so //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slob ma padma gar dbang gi rnam par bya'o //

analyzed: ces bya ba ni byang chub thams cad bskyed pa'o // slob ma rta mchog lha mo ni //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rta mchog go // sgrol mas 'khyud pa bsam par bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgrol ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o //

original: rtag pa'i gzugs su bskyed la /
analyzed: rtag pa'i gzugs su bskyed la /

analyzed: slar yang bgegs bsal ba dang / mchod pa byas nas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya bar bsgrub pa'o //

original: de nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya //üîΩzhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya // zhes bya ba ni /

original: 'khor lo'i gtso la bstod par bya //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i gtso la bstod par bya //

original: zhes bya ba'i 'og tu sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i 'og tu sbyar bar bya'o //

original: lha mo brgyad kyis mchod nas ni //
analyzed: lha mo brgyad kyis mchod nas ni //

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i rig ma brgyad kyis mchod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i rig ma brgyad kyis mchod pa'o //

original: 'khor lo'i gtso bo bstod par bya //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i gtso bo bstod par bya //
translated: One should praise the chief of the wheel.

original: zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: This is

analyzed: 'og nas 'byung ba'i glu dang sbyar ro //

original: de nas yan lag drug po bsgom //
analyzed: de nas yan lag drug po bsgom //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha dog rnam pa drug 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi rang bzhin gyi gnas su ston pa ste /

original: de la nag po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po dang / dkar po'i rim gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba tsam gyi bdag nyid du 'khor lo'i bdag po rnams bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de la nag po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po dang / dkar po'i rim gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba tsam gyi bdag nyid du 'khor lo'i bdag po rnams bsgom par bya'o //
translated: There, one should meditate on the wheel lords as having the nature of mere innate joy, in the order of black, red, yellow, green, blue, and white.

original: de dag ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin te gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin te gnyis pa'o //

original: bdag byin brlab pas byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: bdag byin brlab pas byin gyis brlab //
translated: One should consecrate with the consecration of self-consecration.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: This is

analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa ni rang gi ye shes te /

analyzed: des gzhan dag byin gyis brlab pa ni rang gi ye shes su sbyar ba'o //

analyzed: dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phra mo'i 'od zer dang po sprin dang 'dra bar mthug pa ste /

original: he ru ka'i 'o //
analyzed: he ru ka'i 'o //
translated: The light of Heruka.üîΩThe second is like smoke.

original: gnyis pa du ba lta bu yin //üîΩzhes bya ba ni 'od zer gnyis pa mkha' la chags pa'i dud sprin ltar snang ba ste rtag pa'i 'o //

original: gsum pa srin bu me khyer 'dra //
analyzed: gsum pa srin bu me khyer 'dra //
translated: The fourth is like a butter lamp.üîΩThe fourth light is like a butter lamp.üîΩThe fifth is like the sun.üîΩThe fifth light is like the sun.üîΩThe sixth is like the moon.üîΩThe sixth light is like the moon.

analyzed: zhes bya ba mkha' @71a * // zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The seventh is like a cloudless sky.üîΩThe seventh light is like a cloudless sky.üîΩThe eighth is like a flash of lightning.üîΩThe eighth light is like a flash of lightning.üîΩThe ninth is like a mass of fire.üîΩThe ninth light is like a mass of fire.

analyzed: au da ya zhes bya ba ni shar zhing skyes pa ste / sangs rgyas kyi sku yin la /
translated: The tenth is like the light of the rising sun.üîΩThe tenth light is like the light of the rising sun.üîΩThe eleventh is like the light of the setting sun.üîΩThe eleventh light is like the light of the setting sun.üîΩThe twelfth is like the light of the full moon.üîΩThe twelfth light is like the light of the full moon.üîΩThe thirteenth is like the light of the new moon.

analyzed: de ltar snang ba'i 'od ni gsum pa ste / nyi ma'i yin no //
translated: The thirteenth light is like the light of the new moon.üîΩThe fourteenth is like the light of the stars.

original: bzhi ba mar me lta bur 'bar //
analyzed: bzhi ba mar me lta bur 'bar //
translated: The fourteenth light is like the light of the stars.

original: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni //
analyzed: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni //
translated: The fifteenth light is like the light of the planets.üîΩThe sixteenth is like the light of the king of jewels.üîΩThe sixteenth light is like the light of the king of jewels.üîΩThe seventeenth is like the light of the king of lamps.üîΩThe seventeenth light is like the light of the king of lamps.üîΩThe eighteenth is like the light of the king of gems.üîΩThe eighteenth light is like the light of the king of gems.üîΩThe nineteenth is like the light of the king of pearls.

original: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: The nineteenth light is like the light of the king of pearls.üîΩThe twentieth is like the light of the king of crystals.üîΩThe twentieth light is like the light of the king of crystals.üîΩThe twenty-first is like the light of the king of gold.üîΩThe twenty-first light is like the light of the king of gold.üîΩThe twenty-second is like the light of the king of silver.

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snang ba gang nam mkha'i rnam pa ltar rgyun du gsal bar snang ba ste rta mchog go //
translated: The twenty-second light is like the light of the king of silver.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The twenty-third is

original: zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnyed pa'o //
translated: This is the attainment of meditative concentration.

original: phyi nas sgyu ma'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnyed nas mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsdu zhing rmi lam ltar brdzun pa nyid kyis ni nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shin tu phra ba'i rnam pas bdag med pa nyid du bsdu bar bya'o
analyzed: phyi nas sgyu ma'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnyed nas mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsdu zhing rmi lam ltar brdzun pa nyid kyis ni nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shin tu phra ba'i rnam pas bdag med pa nyid du bsdu bar bya'o
translated: After that, in the manner of an illusion, having attained meditative concentration, one should dissolve the mandala of signs, as in a dream, into selflessness with the aspect of the extremely subtle mandala of the sun and moon.

original: // 'dis gnyis pa thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs nas gnas pa ste mos pas spyod pa'i sas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: // 'dis gnyis pa thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs nas gnas pa ste mos pas spyod pa'i sas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: This is the second stage, the stage of engagement through belief, consecrated by the realization of everything as emptiness.

original: skad cig 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yid lhag par dga' ba ste /
analyzed: skad cig 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yid lhag par dga' ba ste /
translated: The moment it changes, there is mental delight.

original: sngar ma rtogs pa'i chos nyid rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar ma rtogs pa'i chos nyid rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the realization of reality not previously realized.

original: de yang chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba'i don du rtogs pas bdag dang gzhan gyi 'khor lo gsum po mnyam zhing gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bu'i sku snang ba ste /

translated: Moreover, by realizing the meaning of the all-pervading expanse of reality, one‚Äôs own and others‚Äô three wheels are equal, and one‚Äôs body appears in the aspect of a reflection.

original: rab tu dga' ba'i sas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i sas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: It is consecrated by the stage of Extreme Joy.

original: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
analyzed: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
translated: The three realms, moving and unmoving,üîΩare completely purified.

original: zhes bya ba la rgyu ba ni sems can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rgyu ba ni sems can no //
translated: Moving refers to sentient beings.

original: mi rgyu ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten no //
analyzed: mi rgyu ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten no //

analyzed: rdo rje'i lus can zhes bya ba ni sa mi g-yo ba la sogs par 'jug pa'o //

original: de ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: de ci zhig ce na /

analyzed: gong du thal ba'i sku ni ye shes kyi phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: de la ye shes phung po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la ye shes phung po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The aggregate of wisdom refers to

analyzed: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste /

analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the nature of the mirror-like wisdom and so forth.

original: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni sprul ba'i sku ste /
analyzed: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni sprul ba'i sku ste /
translated: The wise one is the emanation body,

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag gi yid dang 'tsham pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag gi yid dang 'tsham pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is in accord with the minds of all transmigrators.

analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lngar phye ba yi //

original: rdul mtshon gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni skud pa bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdul mtshon gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni skud pa bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: are also with colored powders.

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga ni rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga ste //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga ni rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga ste //
translated: The twenty-five are the twenty-five aspects.

original: rtag pa la ni sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar po'o //
analyzed: rtag pa la ni sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar po'o //
translated: The permanent is blue, yellow, red, green, and white.

original: nyi ma la ni dkar po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po'o //
analyzed: nyi ma la ni dkar po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po'o //
translated: The sun is white, blue, red, green, and yellow.

original: gar gyi dbang phyug la ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po dang ; ljang gu dang / dmar po'o //
analyzed: gar gyi dbang phyug la ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po dang ; ljang gu dang / dmar po'o //
translated: The Lord of the Dance is white, yellow, blue, green, and red.

original: rta mchog la ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / sngon po dang / ljang gu'o //
analyzed: rta mchog la ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / sngon po dang / ljang gu'o //
translated: The Supreme Horse is white, yellow, red, blue, and green.

original: he ru ka la ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / nag po ste /
analyzed: he ru ka la ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / nag po ste /
translated: Heruka is white, yellow, red, green, and black.

original: 'dir ni sangs rgyas mgon po rnams //
analyzed: 'dir ni sangs rgyas mgon po rnams //
translated: Here, the Lord Buddhas

original: gang zhig dbus @85b gnas dkyil 'khor yin //
analyzed: gang zhig dbus @85b gnas dkyil 'khor yin //
translated: are the mandala in the center.

original: zhes smos pas so //
analyzed: zhes smos pas so //
translated: This is what is said.

original: 'dir sems gtso bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir sems gtso bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, in order to teach that mind is primary,

original: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo he badzra nyid yin par bstan mod kyi /
analyzed: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo he badzra nyid yin par bstan mod kyi /
translated: it is taught that Hevajra is the principal of the mandala of the assembly.

original: gzhan dag kyang dgag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang dgag pa ma yin te /
translated: However, the others are not excluded,

original: gnas 'pho ba dang / brtan pa'i rim gyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas 'pho ba dang / brtan pa'i rim gyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin gzung bar bya'o //
translated: because they are to be apprehended as desired by the process of the transference and stabilization of the abodes.

original: de nyid kyis na gtso bo'i bye brag gis sa'i cha'i kha dog gzung ngo //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na gtso bo'i bye brag gis sa'i cha'i kha dog gzung ngo //
translated: Therefore, the color of the earth part is grasped by the particular of the principal.

original: dkyil 'khor re re bsgom pa'am //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor re re bsgom pa'am //
translated: One should meditate on each mandala.

original: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor so so'i rim pas bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor so so'i rim pas bsgom pa'o //
translated: This means that one should meditate on the mandalas in the order of the individual mandalas.

original: yang na bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: yang na bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te //
translated: Or else, the concise mandala.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: This means the concise mandala.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba lnga dbus su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba lnga dbus su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga bsgom pa'o //
translated: One should meditate on the five mandalas with the five chakravartins in the center.

original: brgyad brgyad kyi ni dbus bzhugs pa'am //
analyzed: brgyad brgyad kyi ni dbus bzhugs pa'am //
translated: Residing in the center of eight and eight.

original: zhes bya ba de nyid kyi bshad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de nyid kyi bshad pa ste /
translated: This is the explanation of that.

original: ma mo brgyad brgyad kyis bskor ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba lnga rnams bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: ma mo brgyad brgyad kyis bskor ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba lnga rnams bsdus pa'o //
translated: The five chakravartins are included in the eight mothers.

original: sgo skyong ma rnams sgor dgod pa //
analyzed: sgo skyong ma rnams sgor dgod pa //
translated: The door guardians are placed at the doors.

original: de tshe bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor yin //
analyzed: de tshe bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor yin //
translated: At that time, it is the concise mandala.

original: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po lag na lcags kyu thogs pa la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams sgor dgod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po lag na lcags kyu thogs pa la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams sgor dgod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that in the great mandala, the goddesses such as Hook-in-Hand are placed at the doors.

original: nya dang rgyal po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nya dang rgyal po zhes bya ba la /
translated: Fish and king.

original: nya ni ro hi ta'i nya'o //
analyzed: nya ni ro hi ta'i nya'o //
translated: The fish is a rohita fish.

original: rgyal po ni sprul gyi rgyal po'o //üîΩ'gro ba rnams kyi rab mchog ni //
analyzed: rgyal po ni sprul gyi rgyal po'o // 'gro ba rnams kyi rab mchog ni //
translated: The king is the king of snakes.üîΩThe best of migrations is

original: mi rnams kyi ni 'gro ba ste //üîΩzhes bya ba ni mi rnams kyi 'gro ba la brten nas nges pa'i rigs can dang ma nges pa'i rigs rnams kyis mngon du dang rim gyis kyang /
analyzed: mi rnams kyi ni 'gro ba ste // zhes bya ba ni mi rnams kyi 'gro ba la brten nas nges pa'i rigs can dang ma nges pa'i rigs rnams kyis mngon du dang rim gyis kyang /
translated: the migration of humans.

original: byang chub rnam pa gsum thob par 'gyur gyi 'gro ba gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: byang chub rnam pa gsum thob par 'gyur gyi 'gro ba gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: The migration of humans is the basis for those of fixed potential and unfixed potential to attain the three kinds of enlightenment, either manifestly or gradually.

original: de rnams skye gnas dang shes rab dman pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams skye gnas dang shes rab dman pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But not by any other migration, because those other migrations are inferior in terms of birth and wisdom.

original: de nyid kyis na mi rnams kyi 'gro ba gya nom pa nyid do //üîΩglang po la sogs nad rnams bsnams //üîΩzhes bya ba ni phyag g-yas kyi thod pa na bsnams pa rnams ni nad yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na mi rnams kyi 'gro ba gya nom pa nyid do // glang po la sogs nad rnams bsnams // zhes bya ba ni phyag g-yas kyi thod pa na bsnams pa rnams ni nad yin la /
translated: And that is why the migration of humans is the best.üîΩHe holds the diseases of elephants, etc.üîΩThe diseases are held in the skull cup in his right hand.

original: don gyis na g-yon pa rnams ni sman yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don gyis na g-yon pa rnams ni sman yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The implication is that the medicines are held in the skull cups in his left hand.

original: nad thams cad dbugs dbyung zhing rab tu zhi ba rdo rje zhes bya ba la nad thams cad rab tu zhi bas de las dbugs dbyung ba gang du ston pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: nad thams cad dbugs dbyung zhing rab tu zhi ba rdo rje zhes bya ba la nad thams cad rab tu zhi bas de las dbugs dbyung ba gang du ston pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The vajra that is the exhalation and complete pacification of all illnesses is so called because it is taught that exhalation is due to the complete pacification of all illnesses.

original: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i dka' 'grel de kho na nyid rgyas pa las /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i dka' 'grel de kho na nyid rgyas pa las /
translated: In the commentary on the Vajradaka of the dakinis, the Tattvapuspi,

original: le'u lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: this is the explanation of the fifth chapter.

original: // / lus rnams thams cad 'dzin pa po //üîΩzhes @86a * //
analyzed: // / lus rnams thams cad 'dzin pa po // zhes @86a * //
translated: The holder of all bodies

original: bya ba ni sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dzin pa'o //
translated: is the holder of all the mantras and deities.

original: sems ni rjes dran zhes bya ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha spros pa'i dus dang mtshan ma lnga thob nas rdo rje phra mo spro ba'i rim gyis rjes su dran pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sems ni rjes dran zhes bya ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha spros pa'i dus dang mtshan ma lnga thob nas rdo rje phra mo spro ba'i rim gyis rjes su dran pa bstan pa'o //
translated: The mind recollection and so forth are taught as the recollection through the process of emanating the subtle vajra after attaining the five signs at the time of emanating the mandala deities.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas //
translated: Having meditated on Vajrasattva

original: zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa rdo rje bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa rdo rje bsgom pa'o //
translated: is meditating on Hevajra.

original: phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas gdab pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas gdab pa //
translated: The sealing with the four sealsüîΩis the four seals of the pledge, the doctrinal, the action, and the great.

original: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs dang / sa bon dang mtshan ma'i tshul gyi ye shes sems dbas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs dang / sa bon dang mtshan ma'i tshul gyi ye shes sems dbas so //
translated: Thus, the wisdom being is the mind of exalted body, speech, and mind, and the seed and sign.

original: yang na lte ba dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / mgo bo'i sgo rnams su drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / brgyad dang / bcu drug dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'dab ma can gyi padma /
analyzed: yang na lte ba dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / mgo bo'i sgo rnams su drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / brgyad dang / bcu drug dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'dab ma can gyi padma /
translated: Or, the four doors of the navel, heart, throat, and head are the lotuses with sixty-four, eight, sixteen, and thirty-two petals, respectively.

original: sbrul ba dang / chos dang / longs spyod dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la rim bzhin du /
analyzed: sbrul ba dang / chos dang / longs spyod dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la rim bzhin du /
translated: The wheels are the emanation, doctrine, enjoyment, and great bliss wheels.

original: aam dang h'um dang aom dang ham gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: aam dang h'um dang aom dang ham gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: They are blessed by the a, ha, o, and ha syllables, respectively.

original: rtag pa la sogs pa la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rtag pa la sogs pa la yang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true of eternity and so forth.

original: zhes sdang rgyal po cha zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //üîΩzhe sdang thams cad zad mdzad pa //
analyzed: zhes sdang rgyal po cha zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o // zhe sdang thams cad zad mdzad pa //
translated: The king of hatred is Hevajra.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis dang bral ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis dang bral ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The destroyer of all hatred is the nature free from duality.

original: spro ba'i sbyor bas bsgom bya zhing //üîΩrab tu bsdu ba bstan pa ste /
analyzed: spro ba'i sbyor bas bsgom bya zhing // rab tu bsdu ba bstan pa ste /
translated: One should meditate with the yoga of emanation.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The teaching of complete withdrawal is the yoga of concentration.üîΩ Thus, the yoga of concentration is the yoga of the mind.üîΩ The yoga of emanation is the yoga of the body.

original: rang gi sku'i sprin nam mtshan ma'i sprin sngags kyi theg le las spro zhing bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi sku'i sprin nam mtshan ma'i sprin sngags kyi theg le las spro zhing bsdu ba ste /
translated: The cloud of his body or the cloud of signs is emitted from the bindu of mantra and is reabsorbed.

original: thig le phra mo dang rjes su dran pa rnams bsdu ba'o //üîΩrdo rje sems la mi phyed pa //
analyzed: thig le phra mo dang rjes su dran pa rnams bsdu ba'o // rdo rje sems la mi phyed pa //
translated: The subtle bindu and the recollections are reabsorbed.üîΩOne should crown Vajrasattva

original: zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu rgyan bya'o //üîΩde bzhin du rtag pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu rgyan bya'o // de bzhin du rtag pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: with a crossed vajra.

original: nyi ma la ni rdo rje rin chen no //
analyzed: nyi ma la ni rdo rje rin chen no //
translated: In the same way, one should crown Akshobhya with a wheel, Ratnasambhava with a jewel,

original: gang gi dbang phyug la ni padma'o //
analyzed: gang gi dbang phyug la ni padma'o //
translated: Amitabha with a lotus,üîΩAmoghasiddhi with a sword.

original: rta mchog la ni ral gri'i dbu rgyan du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rta mchog la ni ral gri'i dbu rgyan du shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the crown ornament is a sword.

original: dpag tshad bye ba zhes bya ba ni grangs med par mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: dpag tshad bye ba zhes bya ba ni grangs med par mtshon pa'o //
translated: A million leagues indicates an incalculable [number].

original: sangs rgyas nga rgyal la dmigs bya //üîΩzhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nga rgyal la dmigs bya // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should visualize the pride of being a buddha.

original: bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du mos pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du mos pa'o //
translated: One should visualize the pride of being a buddha.

original: chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal bar //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal bar //
translated: The realm of phenomena is luminosity.

original: gang phyir bsgoms ba de yis ni //
analyzed: gang phyir bsgoms ba de yis ni //
translated: Because of meditating on that,

original: sems can sangs rgyas dang mnyam 'gro //
analyzed: sems can sangs rgyas dang mnyam 'gro //
translated: sentient beings go to the state of buddhahood.

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od gsal zhing sgyu ma ltar bsgoms pas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bas so //üîΩbden min tog pa'i rnam rtog gis //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od gsal zhing sgyu ma ltar bsgoms pas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bas so // bden min tog pa'i rnam rtog gis //
translated: This is because one becomes a Buddha by meditating on the Buddha-body as clear light and illusory.

original: sems ni dri ma can du byas //
analyzed: sems ni dri ma can du byas //
translated: The mind is defiled by false imagination.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: bden min rtog pa ni @86b bdag dang bdag gi bzung ba dang 'dzin par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: bden min rtog pa ni @86b bdag dang bdag gi bzung ba dang 'dzin par zhen pa'o //
translated: false imagination is the conception of the grasped and the grasper as a self and something pertaining to a self.

original: de nyid ni rnam par rtog pa ste rnam pa sna tshogs su zhen pa'i blo gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: de nyid ni rnam par rtog pa ste rnam pa sna tshogs su zhen pa'i blo gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid de /
translated: That itself is imagination, the nature of the dependent on others, the mind that conceives of various things.

original: des sems kyi rin po che sbags pa'o //
analyzed: des sems kyi rin po che sbags pa'o //
translated: By that, the jewel of the mind is defiled.

original: ji ltar nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' khug rnal sogs pa dang bral ba ltar glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' khug rnal sogs pa dang bral ba ltar glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral ba'o //
translated: Just as space is free from clouds, etc., it is free from adventitious defilements.

original: 'jig med pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis brtan pas brtags pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig med pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis brtan pas brtags pa'o //
translated: It is indestructible because it is naturally stable.

original: sems kyi rin chen rab tu bskul //
analyzed: sems kyi rin chen rab tu bskul //
translated: The jewel of the mind is well stimulated.

original: zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i don bsgoms pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i don bsgoms pa'o //
translated: This is the meditation on the meaning of reality.

original: ci ste phyi rol gyi ka ba dang bum pa la sogs pa snang ba ni yod pa nyid dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: ci ste phyi rol gyi ka ba dang bum pa la sogs pa snang ba ni yod pa nyid dmigs pa yin te /
translated: If you say that the appearance of external things such as pillars and pots is the perception of what exists,

original: gang na seng ge gnas pa der seng ger snang ba skye'i //
analyzed: gang na seng ge gnas pa der seng ger snang ba skye'i //
translated: then in a place where a lion lives, the appearance of a lion arises,

original: med pa'i phyogs su ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: med pa'i phyogs su ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but not in a place where it does not exist.

original: 'khrul par bstan pa'i rin po che sems zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'khrul par bstan pa'i rin po che sems zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The commentary says ‚Äúthe jewel mind, which is taught to be mistaken.‚Äù

original: 'di'i don ni rmi lam la sogs pa dang 'dra bar don med bzhin du yang sems 'ba' zhig don du snang gi gnyis yod nas snang ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni rmi lam la sogs pa dang 'dra bar don med bzhin du yang sems 'ba' zhig don du snang gi gnyis yod nas snang ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The meaning of this is that, like in a dream and so on, the mind alone appears as an object, even though there is no object, and it is not that the appearance is due to the existence of two things.

original: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che //
translated: The great kingdom of the three realms

original: zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sbrul pa'i sku'i khams gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sbrul pa'i sku'i khams gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa'o //
translated: means that he is the lord of the three realms with the enjoyment body and emanation body.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po rab gsal ba //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po rab gsal ba //
translated: The essence of Vajrasattva is clearly manifest

original: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'o //
translated: means that all phenomena are selfless.

original: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i dka' 'grel de kho na nyid rgyas pa las /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i dka' 'grel de kho na nyid rgyas pa las /
translated: This concludes the commentary on the Vajradaka Tantra called ‚ÄúThe Extensive Reality.‚Äù

original: le'u drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: The explanation of chapter six.

original: // / de nas rdo rje zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid do /
analyzed: // / de nas rdo rje zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid do /
translated: Then, the vajra is the nature of the space-like dharmakƒÅya.

original: rnam pa lnga po bsgom par bya //
analyzed: rnam pa lnga po bsgom par bya //
translated: The five aspects should be cultivated.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: a'a li bco lnga las byung ba'i zla ba dang / k'a li sum cu rtsa bzhi sas byung ba'i nyi ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan skar ma lta bu zhugs pa dang / aam dang / h'um las byung ba'i zangs gre dang / thod pa dang /
analyzed: a'a li bco lnga las byung ba'i zla ba dang / k'a li sum cu rtsa bzhi sas byung ba'i nyi ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan skar ma lta bu zhugs pa dang / aam dang / h'um las byung ba'i zangs gre dang / thod pa dang /
translated: the moon arisen from the fifteen vowels and the sun arisen from the thirty-four consonants, which is the entry of the stars, which are the qualities of all buddhas, and the copper-colored and skull-shaped vajra arisen from a·πÉ and h≈´·πÉ, respectively.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi 'khor lo spro ba dang bsdu ba dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs su bskyed pa dag bsgoms pa'o /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi 'khor lo spro ba dang bsdu ba dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs su bskyed pa dag bsgoms pa'o /
translated: The cultivation is the emanation and re-absorption of the wheels of the yoginƒ´s and the generation of the form of Vajradhara.

original: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i tshul bzhin du dgod ces bya ba ni rang lhag pa'i lha'i sku las dkyil 'khor pa rnams spro zhing bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i tshul bzhin du dgod ces bya ba ni rang lhag pa'i lha'i sku las dkyil 'khor pa rnams spro zhing bsdu ba'o //
translated: Arranging in the manner of the ma·πá·∏çala means emanating and re-absorbing the ma·πá·∏çala from the body of the excellent deity.

original: 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //

original: 'dis ni phreng ba dang chu'i dbang bskur ba'i rnam par dag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings dang me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi chus mi shes pa'i dri ma 'khru bar bshad pa'o //

original: rin chen zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams so //

original: bla ma'i bla zhes bya ba ni nga rgyal chen po bla na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla ma'i bla zhes bya ba ni nga rgyal chen po bla na med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'dis ni rang gi bdag pos mtshan pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi cod pan dbang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su rnam par dag pa bstan to //

original: 'dod chags la sogs mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir //

original: zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis chos rnams kyi chos nyid la chags shing rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
